00034 extern GuiSound *g_tetrisCheerSound; ///< the tetris sound effect
00035 extern Options *g_options;  ///< the global options

00041 // Reset all state associated with this player.
00042 void Player::Reset()
00043 {
00044   memset(&gameData, 0, sizeof(PlayerGameData));
00045   gameData.pieces = -1;
00046   gameData.speed = START_SPEED;
00047 
00048   for (int y = 0; y < MAX_PLAYFIELD_HEIGHT; ++y)
00049   {
00050     for (int x = 0; x < MAX_PLAYFIELD_WIDTH; ++x)
00051       gameData.playfield[x][y].pieceId = TETRISPIECE_ID_NONE;
00052   }
00053 
00054   nextPiece.InitPiece(TetrisPiece::GetNextId());
00055   nextPiece.SetPowerupId(PowerupUtils::GetNextId(*this));
00056   _SpawnNextPiece();
00057 
00058   PowerupId *tmpPowerupStartQueue = !isHandicapEnabled ? 
00059     g_options->profile.powerupStartQueue : profile.powerupStartQueue;
00060   
00061   for (int i = 0; i < MAX_ACQUIRED_POWERUPS; ++i)
00062   {
00063     PowerupId pid = tmpPowerupStartQueue[i];
00064     if (pid != POWERUP_ID_NONE)
00065       gameData.powerupQueue[i] = PowerupUtils::GetStaticInstance(pid);
00066   }
00067 }
00068 
00069 // Draw the playfield (all the static tetris pieces).
00070 void Player::DrawPlayfield()
00071 {
00072   TetrisPieceConnectivityInfo *connectivityInfo = NULL;
00073   GuiImageData *imgData = NULL;
00074 
00075   for (int y = 0; y < playfieldHeight; ++y)
00076   {
00077     for (int x = 0; x < playfieldWidth; ++x)
00078     {
00079       TetrisPieceId pieceId = gameData.playfield[x][y].pieceId;
00080       if (pieceId == TETRISPIECE_ID_NONE)
00081         continue;
00082 
00083       ColorId gfx = (ColorId)pieceId;
00084 
00085       if (gameData.isDead)
00086       {
00087         gfx = COLOR_ID_DEAD;
00088       }
00089       else
00090       {
00091         connectivityInfo = gameData.playfield[x][y].connectivityInfo;
00092         imgData = !connectivityInfo ?
00093           NULL : PowerupUtils::GetImageData(connectivityInfo->powerupId);
00094       }
00095 
00096       DrawBlockAsCube(x, y, gfx, 255, imgData);
00097     }
00098   }
00099 }
00100 
00101 /** If no piece is specified, then the player's current piece is drawn. */
00102 void Player::DrawPiece(TetrisPiece* cp, u8 alpha)
00103 {
00104   TetrisPiece &piece = !cp ? currPiece : *cp;
00105   const TetrisPieceDesc &desc = piece.GetPieceDescription();
00106 
00107   ColorId gfx = (ColorId)piece.GetPieceId();
00108   GuiImageData *imgData = (piece.GetPowerupId() == POWERUP_ID_NONE) ? 
00109     NULL : PowerupUtils::GetImageData(piece.GetPowerupId());
00110 
00111   if (gameData.isDead)
00112   {
00113     gfx = COLOR_ID_DEAD;
00114     imgData = NULL;
00115   }
00116 
00117   // Every tetris piece fits into a 4x4 grid.
00118   for (int y = 0; y < 4; ++y)
00119   {
00120     for (int x = 0; x < 4; ++x)
00121     {
00122       // The playfield is a playfield_width x playfield_height grid 
00123       // (default: 10x20); the upper left corner corresponds to (0,0).
00124       // (piece.x, piece.y) is a playfield coordinate that corresponds to the 
00125       // upper left corner of the tetris piece's 4x4 grid. Thus,
00126       // (calcx, calcy) gives the playfield coordinate for each of the 
00127       // tetris piece's 4x4 grid elements.
00128       int calcx = piece.GetX() + x;
00129       int calcy = piece.GetY() + y;
00130 
00131       // Allow the screen to wrap horizontally.
00132       if (calcx >= playfieldWidth)
00133         calcx -= playfieldWidth;
00134       else if (calcx < 0)
00135         calcx += playfieldWidth;
00136 
00137       if (desc.map[x][y] && calcx >= 0 && calcy >= 0)
00138         DrawBlockAsCube(calcx, calcy, gfx, alpha, imgData);
00139     }
00140   }
00141 }
00142 
00143 // Draw where the current piece will end up if dropped.
00144 void Player::DrawPieceShadow()
00145 {
00146   if (guide == GUIDE_OFF)
00147     return;
00148 
00149   int y = 0;
00150   if (guide == GUIDE_SHADOW)
00151   {
00152     // Create a copy of the current piece, move it down as much as possible, 
00153     // then draw it. Only draw the shadow piece if it is more than x spaces 
00154     // away from the actual piece.
00155     TetrisPiece piece = currPiece;
00156     y = piece.GetY();
00157     while (MovePiece(DOWN, &piece));
00158     if (y < 7 && piece.GetY() > 11)
00159       DrawPiece(&piece, 145);
00160 
00161     return;
00162   }
00163   
00164   // else: GUIDE_LINE
00165   int x = 0;
00166   const TetrisPieceDesc &desc = currPiece.GetPieceDescription();
00167 
00168   // Calculate the leftmost lowest block.
00169   for (int my = 0; my < 4; ++my)
00170   {
00171     for (int mx = 0; mx < 4; ++mx)
00172     {
00173       if (desc.map[mx][my])
00174       {
00175         x = currPiece.GetX() + mx;
00176         y = currPiece.GetY() + my + 1;
00177         break;
00178       }
00179     }
00180   }
00181 
00182   if (x < 0)
00183     x += playfieldWidth;
00184   else if (x >= playfieldWidth)
00185     x -= playfieldWidth;
00186   
00187   for (; y < playfieldHeight; ++y)
00188   {
00189     if (gameData.playfield[x][y].pieceId == TETRISPIECE_ID_NONE)
00190       DrawBlockAsCube(x, y, COLOR_ID_RED, 128, NULL, true);
00191   }
00192 }
00193 
00194 // Draw the base of the TetriCycle.
00195 void Player::DrawBase()
00196 {
00197   GXColor color;
00198 
00199   for (int x = 0; x < playfieldWidth; ++x)
00200   {
00201     int idx = (x + gameData.cycleIdx) % playfieldWidth;
00202     u8 c = idx * 8; // black to white
00203     color = (GXColor){c, c, c, 255};
00204     _SetBaseColor(color);
00205     DrawBlockAsCube(x, playfieldHeight, COLOR_ID_BASE);
00206   }
00207 }
00208 
00209 // Move the playfield.
00210 bool Player::MovePlayfield(int type)
00211 {
00212   TetrisPiece &piece = currPiece;
00213 
00214   int oldx = piece.GetX();
00215   int x = oldx;
00216 
00217   // First move the current piece and check that it's a valid move.
00218   // Moving the playfield right is equivalent to moving the piece left.
00219   switch (type)
00220   {
00221     case RIGHT:
00222       --x;
00223       if (x < 0)
00224         x += playfieldWidth;
00225       piece.SetX(x);
00226       break;
00227 
00228     case LEFT:
00229       ++x;
00230       if (x >= playfieldWidth)
00231         x -= playfieldWidth;
00232       piece.SetX(x);
00233       break;
00234   }
00235 
00236   bool canPlace = _CanPlacePiece();
00237 
00238   // Move the piece back to where it was.
00239   piece.SetX(oldx);
00240 
00241   if (!canPlace)
00242     return false;
00243 
00244   // Move the playfield.
00245   TetrisPieceBlock *playfieldTPB = &gameData.playfield[0][0];
00246   TetrisPieceBlock tmpTPB;
00247   TetrisPieceBlock *prevTPB, *currTPB;
00248 
00249   if (type == LEFT)
00250   {
00251     for (int r = 0; r < playfieldHeight; ++r)
00252     {
00253       prevTPB = playfieldTPB + r;
00254       currTPB = prevTPB + MAX_PLAYFIELD_HEIGHT;
00255       tmpTPB = *prevTPB;
00256 
00257       for (int c = 0; c < playfieldWidth - 1; ++c, prevTPB += MAX_PLAYFIELD_HEIGHT, currTPB += MAX_PLAYFIELD_HEIGHT)
00258         *prevTPB = *currTPB;
00259 
00260       *prevTPB = tmpTPB;
00261     }
00262   }
00263   else if (type == RIGHT)
00264   {
00265     for (int r = 0; r < playfieldHeight; ++r)
00266     {
00267       prevTPB = playfieldTPB + (playfieldWidth - 1) * MAX_PLAYFIELD_HEIGHT + r;
00268       currTPB = prevTPB - MAX_PLAYFIELD_HEIGHT;
00269       tmpTPB = *prevTPB;
00270 
00271       for (int c = 0; c < playfieldWidth - 1; ++c, prevTPB -= MAX_PLAYFIELD_HEIGHT, currTPB -= MAX_PLAYFIELD_HEIGHT)
00272         *prevTPB = *currTPB;
00273 
00274       *prevTPB = tmpTPB;
00275     }
00276   }
00277 
00278   return true;
00279 }
00280 
00281 /** If no piece is specified then the player's current piece is used. */
00282 bool Player::MovePiece(int type, TetrisPiece *cp)
00283 {
00284   TetrisPiece &piece = !cp ? currPiece : *cp;
00285 
00286   int oldx = piece.GetX();
00287   int oldy = piece.GetY();
00288   int x = oldx;
00289 
00290   switch (type)
00291   {
00292     case DOWN:
00293       piece.SetY(oldy + 1);
00294       break;
00295 
00296     case LEFT:
00297       --x;
00298       if (!g_isClassicMode && x < 0)
00299         x += playfieldWidth;
00300       piece.SetX(x);
00301       break;
00302 
00303     case RIGHT:
00304       ++x;
00305       if (!g_isClassicMode && x >= playfieldWidth)
00306         x -= playfieldWidth;
00307       piece.SetX(x);
00308       break;
00309   }
00310 
00311   if (_CanPlacePiece(&piece))
00312     return true;
00313 
00314   piece.SetX(oldx);
00315   piece.SetY(oldy);
00316   return false;
00317 }
00318 
00319 // Move the current piece down automatically.
00320 void Player::DoMovement()
00321 {
00322   const TetrisPieceDesc &desc = currPiece.GetPieceDescription();
00323 
00324   gameData.frame = 0;
00325   currPiece.IncrementDownCounter();
00326 
00327   bool canMove  = MovePiece(DOWN);
00328   bool canplace = _CanPlacePiece();
00329 
00330   // Write piece to map if it can't be moved more.
00331   if (!canMove)
00332   {
00333     TetrisPieceConnectivityInfo *info = (currPiece.GetPowerupId() == POWERUP_ID_NONE) ? 
00334       NULL : new TetrisPieceConnectivityInfo(currPiece.GetPowerupId());
00335 
00336     for (int y = 0; y < 4; ++y)
00337     {
00338       for (int x = 0; x < 4; ++x)
00339       {
00340         // The playfield is a playfield_width x playfield_height grid 
00341         // (default: 10x20); the upper left corner corresponds to (0,0).
00342         // (piece.x, piece.y) is a playfield coordinate that corresponds to the 
00343         // upper left corner of the tetris piece's 4x4 grid. Thus,
00344         // (calcx, calcy) gives the playfield coordinate for each of the 
00345         // tetris piece's 4x4 grid elements.
00346         int calcx = currPiece.GetX() + x;
00347         int calcy = currPiece.GetY() + y;
00348 
00349         // Allow the screen to wrap horizontally.
00350         if (calcx >= playfieldWidth)
00351           calcx -= playfieldWidth;
00352         else if (calcx < 0)
00353           calcx += playfieldWidth;
00354 
00355         if (calcx >= 0 && calcx < playfieldWidth && calcy >= 0 
00356             && calcy < playfieldHeight && desc.map[x][y])
00357         {
00358           gameData.playfield[calcx][calcy].pieceId = currPiece.GetPieceId();
00359           gameData.playfield[calcx][calcy].SetConnectivityInfo(info);
00360         }
00361       }
00362     }
00363   }
00364 
00365   // Player can't move or place ==> dead.
00366   if (!canMove && !canplace)
00367   {
00368     if (g_options->players == 1)
00369     {
00370       gameData.isDead = true;
00371       TCYC_MenuPause("Game Over");
00372       return;
00373     }
00374 
00375     gameData.isDead = true;
00376     _GetWinner();
00377     return;
00378   }
00379 
00380   // Can't move, make a new block.
00381   if (!canMove) 
00382   {
00383     int linesInFrame = 0;
00384     
00385     while (_RemoveLines())
00386       ++linesInFrame;
00387 
00388     if (linesInFrame == 3)
00389     {
00390       gameData.score++; // add one bonus point if you cleared 3 lines
00391     }
00392     else if (linesInFrame == 4)
00393     {
00394       gameData.score += 2;          // add two bonus points if you get a tetris
00395       MODPlay_Pause(&g_modPlay, 1); // pause music
00396       g_tetrisCheerSound->Play();   // Yay you got a tetris!
00397     }
00398 
00399     _SpawnNextPiece();
00400   }
00401 
00402 //#ifndef EMU
00403 //  if (g_options->netplay == 1 && plyrIdx == 0)
00404 //    GC_BBA_SendUDPE(9003, (unsigned char*)map[0], 200);
00405 //#endif
00406 }
00407 
00408 // Draw each tetris piece block as a cube.
00409 void Player::DrawBlockAsCube(float x, float y, ColorId colorIdx, u8 alpha, GuiImageData *imgData, bool isGuideDot)
00410 {
00411   float scale = _GetScale() / (float)DEFAULT_PLAYFIELD_SCALE;
00412   if (g_isClassicMode)
00413     scale -= 0.1;
00414 
00415   float vx = 0;
00416 
00417   if (g_options->players == 1 && !g_options->isNetplay)
00418   {
00419     
00420   }
00421   else if (g_options->players == 2)
00422   {
00423     if (id == 0)
00424       vx = -106.6;
00425     else
00426       vx = 213.4;
00427   }
00428   else if (g_options->players == 3)
00429   {
00430     if (id == 0)
00431       vx = -210;
00432     else if (id == 2)
00433       vx = 210;
00434   }
00435   else if (g_options->players == 4)
00436   {
00437     if (id == 0)
00438       vx = -240;
00439     else if (id == 1)
00440       vx = -80;
00441     else if (id == 2)
00442       vx = 80;
00443     else
00444       vx = 240;
00445   }
00446 
00447   GX_SetViewport(vx + playfieldDX, playfieldDY, g_vmode->fbWidth, g_vmode->efbHeight, 0, 1);
00448 
00449   // x should be a value in {0,...,playfield_width - 1}
00450   // y should be a value in {0,...,playfield_height - 1}
00451   
00452   // Calculate the offset from the center of the playfield.
00453   int centerRight = playfieldWidth >> 1; // playfield_width / 2
00454   int centerLeft  = centerRight - 1;
00455   int offsetFromCenter = (x > centerLeft) ? x - centerLeft : x - centerRight;
00456 
00457   // Convert y to an offset from the bottom, and scale it.
00458   y = ((playfieldHeight >> 1) - 1 - y) * scale; // (playfield_height / 2) - 1
00459 
00460   // The half-cube z-translation.
00461   float hz = scale / 2;
00462 
00463   // TRS ==> Scale should be multiplied last.
00464   static Mtx mscale;
00465   guMtxIdentity(mscale);
00466   if (!isGuideDot)
00467   {
00468     guMtxScale(mscale, scale, scale, scale);
00469   }
00470   else
00471   {
00472     float dotScale = scale * 0.35;
00473     guMtxScale(mscale, dotScale, dotScale, dotScale);
00474   }
00475   
00476   // The angle between cubes in degrees.
00477   float cubeRotation = !g_isClassicMode ? cubeAngle : 0;
00478 
00479   if (offsetFromCenter < 0)
00480   {
00481     scale *= -1;
00482     cubeRotation *= -1;
00483     offsetFromCenter *= -1;
00484   }
00485   
00486   // The cube translation matrix.
00487   // Translate the cube along the x-axis by its length.
00488   static Mtx mtrans;
00489   guMtxIdentity(mtrans);
00490   guMtxTransApply(mtrans, mtrans, scale, 0.f, 0.f); // src, dst, x, y, z
00491 
00492   // The cube rotation matrix.
00493   // Rotate the cube about the y-axis by cubeRotation degrees.
00494   static guVector cubeAxis = {0, 1, 0}; // y-axis
00495   static Mtx mrot;
00496   guMtxIdentity(mrot);
00497   guMtxRotAxisDeg(mrot, &cubeAxis, cubeRotation);
00498 
00499   static Mtx mrottrans;
00500   guMtxIdentity(mrottrans);
00501   guMtxConcat(mrot, mtrans, mrottrans);
00502 
00503   static Mtx model;
00504   static Mtx modelview;
00505 
00506   guMtxIdentity(model);
00507 
00508   for (int i = 0; i < offsetFromCenter - 1; ++i)
00509   {
00510     guMtxConcat(model, mrottrans, model);
00511   }
00512 
00513   guMtxConcat(model, mrot, model);
00514 
00515   // This halfcubetrans is applied before all other translations and rotations.
00516   static Mtx halfcubetrans;
00517   guMtxIdentity(halfcubetrans);
00518   guMtxTransApply(halfcubetrans, halfcubetrans, scale / 2, 0.f, -hz);
00519 
00520   guMtxConcat(model, halfcubetrans, model);
00521   guMtxConcat(model, mscale, model);
00522   
00523   // Translate the cube to the correct y and z position.
00524   static Mtx trans;
00525   guMtxIdentity(trans);
00526   guMtxTransApply(trans, trans, 0, y, -32); // src, dst, x, y, z
00527   
00528   guMtxConcat(trans, model, model);
00529   guMtxConcat(g_view, model, modelview);
00530 
00531   // load the modelview matrix into matrix memory
00532   GX_LoadPosMtxImm(modelview, GX_PNMTX0);
00533   GX_Cube(colorIdx, alpha, imgData);
00534   GX_SetViewport(0, 0, g_vmode->fbWidth, g_vmode->efbHeight, 0, 1);
00535 }
00536 
00537 //--- PRIVATE ---
00538 
00539 void Player::_GetWinner()
00540 {
00541   int ndead = 0;
00542   int winner = 0;
00543 
00544   for (int i = 0; i < g_options->players; ++i)
00545   {
00546     if (g_players[i].gameData.isDead)
00547       ++ndead;
00548     else
00549       winner = i;
00550   }
00551 
00552   if (ndead == g_options->players - 1)
00553     _DisplayWinner(winner);
00554 }
00555 
00556 void Player::_DisplayWinner(int winner)
00557 {
00558   char buf[15];
00559   sprintf(buf, "Player %d wins!", winner + 1);
00560   TCYC_MenuPause(buf);
00561 }
00562 
00563 void Player::_IncreaseLevelAllBut(int plyrIdx)
00564 {
00565   for (int i = 0; i < g_options->players; ++i)
00566   {
00567     if (i != plyrIdx)
00568       g_players[i]._IncreaseLevel();
00569   }
00570 }
00571 
00572 /** If no piece is specified then the player's current piece is used. */
00573 bool Player::_CanPlacePiece(TetrisPiece *cp)
00574 {
00575   TetrisPiece &piece = !cp ? currPiece : *cp;
00576   const TetrisPieceDesc &desc = piece.GetPieceDescription();
00577 
00578   for (int y = 0; y < 4; y++)
00579   {
00580     for (int x = 0; x < 4; x++)
00581     {
00582       // Only check squares that are set in the map
00583       if (desc.map[x][y])
00584       {
00585         // The playfield is a playfield_width x playfield_height grid 
00586         // (default: 10x20); the upper left corner corresponds to (0,0).
00587         // (piece.x, piece.y) is a playfield coordinate that corresponds to the 
00588         // upper left corner of the tetris piece's 4x4 grid. Thus,
00589         // (calcx, calcy) gives the playfield coordinate for each of the 
00590         // tetris piece's 4x4 grid elements.
00591         int calcx = piece.GetX() + x;
00592         int calcy = piece.GetY() + y;
00593 
00594         // Outside the map?
00595         // Allow the screen to wrap horizontally.
00596         
00597         if (calcx >= playfieldWidth)
00598         {
00599           if (!g_isClassicMode)
00600             calcx -= playfieldWidth;
00601           else
00602             return false;
00603         }
00604         else if (calcx < 0)
00605         {
00606           if (!g_isClassicMode)
00607             calcx += playfieldWidth;
00608           else
00609             return false;
00610         }
00611 
00612         if (calcy >= playfieldHeight)
00613           return false;
00614 
00615         // On top of something else?
00616         if (calcy >= 0 
00617             && gameData.playfield[calcx][calcy].pieceId != TETRISPIECE_ID_NONE)
00618           return false;
00619       }
00620     }
00621   }
00622 
00623   return true;
00624 }
00625 
00626 // Removes all the completed lines.
00627 bool Player::_RemoveLines()
00628 {
00629   int blocksInLine = 0;
00630 
00631   for (int y = 0; y < playfieldHeight; ++y)
00632   {
00633     for (int x = 0; x < playfieldWidth; ++x)
00634     {
00635       if (gameData.playfield[x][y].pieceId != TETRISPIECE_ID_NONE)
00636         ++blocksInLine;
00637     }
00638 
00639     if (blocksInLine == playfieldWidth)
00640     {
00641       _RemoveLine(y);
00642       return true;
00643     }
00644 
00645     blocksInLine = 0;
00646   }
00647 
00648   return false;
00649 }
00650 
00651 // Removes the line at the given row.
00652 void Player::_RemoveLine(int line)
00653 {
00654   TetrisPieceConnectivityInfo *connectivityInfo = NULL;
00655 
00656   for (int x = 0; x < playfieldWidth; ++x)
00657   {
00658     // If a block has connectivity info then it belongs to a powerup piece.
00659     connectivityInfo = gameData.playfield[x][line].connectivityInfo;
00660     if (connectivityInfo)
00661     {
00662       connectivityInfo->counter--;
00663 
00664       if (connectivityInfo->counter == 0)
00665       {
00666         // Add powerup to powerup queue.
00667         int slot = GetPowerupQueueSlot();
00668         if (slot >= 0)
00669         {
00670           Powerup *powerup = PowerupUtils::GetStaticInstance(connectivityInfo->powerupId);
00671           QueuePowerup(powerup, slot);
00672         }
00673 
00674         gameData.playfield[x][line].Free();
00675       }
00676     }
00677   }
00678 
00679   for (int y = line; y > 0; --y)
00680   {
00681     for (int x = 0; x < playfieldWidth; ++x)
00682     {
00683       gameData.playfield[x][y] = gameData.playfield[x][y-1];
00684     }
00685   }
00686 
00687   for (int x = 0; x < playfieldWidth; ++x)
00688   {
00689     gameData.playfield[x][0].pieceId = TETRISPIECE_ID_NONE;
00690     gameData.playfield[x][0].SetConnectivityInfo(NULL);
00691   }
00692 
00693   gameData.lines++;
00694   gameData.score++;
00695 
00696   if (g_options->players == 1)
00697   {
00698     if (gameData.lines % 10 == 0)
00699       _IncreaseLevel();
00700 
00701     return;
00702   }
00703 
00704   int tmpMaxLines = isHandicapEnabled ? profile.maxLines : g_options->profile.maxLines;
00705 
00706   if (tmpMaxLines && gameData.lines == tmpMaxLines)
00707   {
00708     _DisplayWinner(id);
00709     return;
00710   }
00711 
00712   int tmpAttackRate = isHandicapEnabled ? profile.attackRate : g_options->profile.attackRate;
00713 
00714   // Attack opponents whenever score is a multiple of attack rate.
00715   if (tmpAttackRate && gameData.score % tmpAttackRate == 0)
00716   {
00717     _IncreaseLevelAllBut(id);
00718   }     
00719 }
Generated on Tue Oct 19 2010 03:28:46 for TetriCycle by  1.7.1
